summary: This document appears to be an internal email exchange regarding the release date of Jeffrey Epstein from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. The sender questions a previously stated release date of July 29, 2019, and provides information indicating Epstein was released on July 30, 2019, after an attorney visit.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email exchange; his release date from MCC is being discussed.

events.title: Epstein's Release from MCC
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was released from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) on July 30, 2019, following an attorney visit that began at 8:20 AM.

events.title: Questioned Release Date
events.description: A prior communication had indicated Epstein's release date was July 29, 2019, which is questioned in this email.

keyFacts: The document is an email exchange dated August 10, 2019, discussing Jeffrey Epstein's release from custody.
It corrects a prior date, stating Epstein was released on July 30, 2019, not July 29.
Epstein had an attorney visit starting at 8:20 AM on the day of his release, July 30.
The email references an 'attorney log' that the sender promises to send next, indicating record-keeping of visits.
The document shows internal confusion or need for clarification regarding the precise timing of a key event in the case.
